<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TarWriter class provides a feature to create a tar archive file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// I put emphasis on simplicity over comprehensiveness when implementing this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// class because we don&#39;t need a full-fledged archive file generator in LLVM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at the moment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The filename field in the Unix V7 tar header is 100 bytes. Longer filenames</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are stored using the PAX extension. The PAX header is standardized in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// POSIX.1-2001.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The struct definition of UstarHeader is copied from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://www.freebsd.org/cgi/man.cgi?query=tar&amp;sektion=5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A PAX attribute is in the form of &quot;&lt;length&gt; &lt;key&gt;=&lt;value&gt;\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where &lt;length&gt; is the length of the entire string including</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the length field itself. An example string is this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   25 ctime=1084839148.1212\\n</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function create such string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="#a6234057413147a09e2c1a0301ed7d452"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::string <a href="#a6234057413147a09e2c1a0301ed7d452">formatPax</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Val) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Len = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>.size() + Val.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>() + 3; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 for &quot; &quot;, &quot;=&quot; and &quot;\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to compute total size twice because appending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a length field could change total size by one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5ab7a47bc553dfc3ee92daf969d0d7ca96b0141273eabab320119c467cdcaf17">Total</a> = Len + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(Len).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine/#a4c1c1093a7749409c70838678514cc7c">str</a>().size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5ab7a47bc553dfc3ee92daf969d0d7ca96b0141273eabab320119c467cdcaf17">Total</a> = Len + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5ab7a47bc553dfc3ee92daf969d0d7ca96b0141273eabab320119c467cdcaf17">Total</a>).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine/#a4c1c1093a7749409c70838678514cc7c">str</a>().size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5ab7a47bc553dfc3ee92daf969d0d7ca96b0141273eabab320119c467cdcaf17">Total</a>) + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a> + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + Val + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">).str();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Headers in tar files must be aligned to 512 byte boundaries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function forwards the current file position to the next boundary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="#a498738d65e5a3c57d210f97b7a475d54"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a498738d65e5a3c57d210f97b7a475d54">pad</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream">raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Pos = OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f90ad570f71349466844ee9f2d06cd1">tell</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream/#a9e2a27de71f137279ac47e6edd4abc47">seek</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Pos, <a href="#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Computes a checksum for a tar header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88" lineLink="#acbe94ad0443f9d2332ed3867b2885f46"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#acbe94ad0443f9d2332ed3867b2885f46">computeChecksum</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader">UstarHeader</a> &amp;Hdr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before computing a checksum, checksum field must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// filled with space characters.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memset(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a4f3128c93a842d7ec13b49f98ff23565">Checksum</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39; &#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a4f3128c93a842d7ec13b49f98ff23565">Checksum</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute a checksum and set it to the checksum field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Chksum = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Hdr); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Chksum += </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;Hdr)&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  snprintf(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a4f3128c93a842d7ec13b49f98ff23565">Checksum</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a4f3128c93a842d7ec13b49f98ff23565">Checksum</a>), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;%06o&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Chksum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a tar header and write it to a given output stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101" lineLink="#a21469ca51d37823d39509ab008a2a7d8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a21469ca51d37823d39509ab008a2a7d8">writePaxHeader</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream">raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Path) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A PAX header consists of a 512-byte header followed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by key-value strings. First, create key-value strings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string PaxAttr = <a href="#a6234057413147a09e2c1a0301ed7d452">formatPax</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;path&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a 512-byte header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader">UstarHeader</a> Hdr = <a href="#aa7196548a41a8c67a20f285e1957664e">makeUstarHeader</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  snprintf(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a846a37a8885b0fa9083c765a8aacef70">Size</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a846a37a8885b0fa9083c765a8aacef70">Size</a>), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;%011zo&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, PaxAttr.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#ad52e2807fb021386c7ff17f210fddd0f">TypeFlag</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;x&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PAX magic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#acbe94ad0443f9d2332ed3867b2885f46">computeChecksum</a>(Hdr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write them down.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS &lt;&lt; StringRef(reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;char &#42;&gt;(&amp;Hdr), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Hdr));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS &lt;&lt; PaxAttr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a498738d65e5a3c57d210f97b7a475d54">pad</a>(OS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Path fits in a Ustar header if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Path is less than 100 characters long, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Path is in the form of &quot;&lt;prefix&gt;/&lt;name&gt;&quot; where &lt;prefix&gt; is less</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   than or equal to 155 characters long and &lt;name&gt; is less than 100</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   characters long. Both &lt;prefix&gt; and &lt;name&gt; can contain extra &#39;/&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Path fits in a Ustar header, updates Prefix and Name and returns true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, returns false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127" lineLink="#aed916c3e798f8216e719e7509db44dff"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aed916c3e798f8216e719e7509db44dff">splitUstar</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Path, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> &amp;Prefix, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> &amp;Name) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Path.size() &lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a1fcc48d5a9dfbf9b8b005bfcfe0a8e04">UstarHeader::Name</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Prefix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Name = Path;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tar 1.13 and earlier unconditionally look at the tar header interpreted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as an &#39;oldgnu&#95;header&#39;, which has an &#39;isextended&#39; byte at offset 482 in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// header, corresponding to offset 137 in the prefix. That&#39;s the version of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tar in gnuwin, so only use 137 of the 155 bytes in the prefix. This means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we&#39;ll need a pax header after 237 bytes of path instead of after 255,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but in return paths up to 237 bytes work with gnuwin, instead of just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 137 bytes of directory + 100 bytes of basename previously.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (tar-1.13 also doesn&#39;t support pax headers, but in practice all paths in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm&#39;s test suite are short enough for that to not matter.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxPrefix = 137;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sep = Path.rfind(</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;/&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, MaxPrefix + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sep == <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-path-cpp-/stringref/#ad0f54a163ac500b144590640c6f1eb6b">StringRef::npos</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Path.size() - Sep - 1 &gt;= </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a1fcc48d5a9dfbf9b8b005bfcfe0a8e04">UstarHeader::Name</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Prefix = Path.substr(0, Sep);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Name = Path.substr(Sep + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The PAX header is an extended format, so a PAX header needs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be followed by a &quot;real&quot; header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157" lineLink="#a31dfcf5521eddbf141e3299c6e316c66"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a31dfcf5521eddbf141e3299c6e316c66">writeUstarHeader</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream">raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Prefix,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader">UstarHeader</a> Hdr = <a href="#aa7196548a41a8c67a20f285e1957664e">makeUstarHeader</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memcpy(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a1fcc48d5a9dfbf9b8b005bfcfe0a8e04">Name</a>, Name.data(), Name.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memcpy(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#af2953283aeb2ff060470ac711d95d6ff">Mode</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;0000664&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  snprintf(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a846a37a8885b0fa9083c765a8aacef70">Size</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a846a37a8885b0fa9083c765a8aacef70">Size</a>), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;%011zo&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memcpy(Hdr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/ustarheader/#a5dc8ba399254e5bcbd97a3ab215f02f3">Prefix</a>, Prefix.data(), Prefix.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#acbe94ad0443f9d2332ed3867b2885f46">computeChecksum</a>(Hdr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS &lt;&lt; StringRef(reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;char &#42;&gt;(&amp;Hdr), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Hdr));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Creates a TarWriter instance and returns it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tarwriter/#a2beba5e45939ded1470d4900ba4aeb42"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;TarWriter&gt;</a>&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tarwriter/#a2beba5e45939ded1470d4900ba4aeb42">TarWriter::create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> OutputPath,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> BaseDir) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs">sys::fs</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FD;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::error&#95;code EC =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">          openFileForWrite(OutputPath, FD, CD&#95;CreateAlways, OF&#95;None))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;StringError&gt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;cannot open &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + OutputPath, EC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;TarWriter&gt;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TarWriter(FD, BaseDir));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">TarWriter::TarWriter(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FD, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> BaseDir)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : OS(FD, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;shouldClose=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;unbuffered=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Append a given file to an archive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tarwriter/#a75d868e42d390e529a8b7aa0d41362ed"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tarwriter/#a75d868e42d390e529a8b7aa0d41362ed">TarWriter::append</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Path, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write Path and Data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string Fullpath = BaseDir + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;/&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#aa8749375717a95d086e49f655fa75046">sys::path::convert&#95;to&#95;slash</a>(Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We do not want to include the same file more than once.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Files.insert(Fullpath).second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Prefix;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#aed916c3e798f8216e719e7509db44dff">splitUstar</a>(Fullpath, Prefix, Name)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a31dfcf5521eddbf141e3299c6e316c66">writeUstarHeader</a>(OS, Prefix, Name, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a21469ca51d37823d39509ab008a2a7d8">writePaxHeader</a>(OS, Fullpath);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a31dfcf5521eddbf141e3299c6e316c66">writeUstarHeader</a>(OS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a498738d65e5a3c57d210f97b7a475d54">pad</a>(OS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// POSIX requires tar archives end with two null blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here, we write the terminator and then seek back, so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the file being output is terminated correctly at any moment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Pos = OS.tell();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS &lt;&lt; std::string(<a href="#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a> &#42; 2, </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\0&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS.seek(Pos);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS.flush();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
